title: Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no ...

attachments.displayName: Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day; begin it well and serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense. ~Ralph Waldo Emerson Borrowed this quote from Barry Blanchard post from this morning. object.content:
Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day; begin it well and serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense. ~Ralph Waldo Emerson

Borrowed this quote from Barry Blanchard post from this morning. Thought it was appropriate for this shot.
